## New Products

###  Artist Studio Lamp 2

The ultimate new artist lamp for medium and large canvasses, sculpting and
other creative tasks...

###  Easel Lamp Go

See every colour on your canvas like never before with the new Easel Lamp Go.

## Top Sellers

###  Magnificent Pro

Floor lamp, table lamp or task lamp: the choice is yours. Keep your hobbies
alive late into the evenings with this versatile, elegant and unobtrusive
magnifying lamp that will fit in with any décor.

###  Smart Go

The Smart Go will enable you to drive your most creative work in style.
Illuminate your treatments, sewing, reading or painting with high quality
light from this reliable, compact lamp. Keep it handy when visiting clients,
in your potting shed, or at your craft club. Take this creative companion with
you wherever you go!

###  Foldi Go

Brilliantly bright, this rechargeable lamp folds around your needs. Portable,
height adjustable and designed with a rotating head, the Foldi Go Rechargeable
Lamp enables you to get the highest quality of light positioned exactly where
you want it.

###  Slimline 3 Table

Precise, bright, and sleek. With its advanced diffusion and aluminium shade,
it banishes shadows for exceptional visibility. The four-step dimmer lets you
tailor the brightness to perfection. Its slim clamp and flexible joints offer
easy positioning. Perfect for professionals, it reduces eye strain and
enhances focus. Elevate your workspace with the Slimline 3 Table Lamp.

## What we do

Daylight™, replicating the brilliance of natural daylight, has been at the
forefront of producing premium quality lamps for over 30 years, providing
perfect illumination for reading, arts, crafts, hobbies, health & beauty,
industry & inspection, sight loss, and other tasks that require detail.

Designed & engineered in Britain by their in-house design team, their stylish
and functional lamps combine ergonomics and design to ensure the best light to
see every word, detail, and colour, at any time of day or night.

Learn More

Natural daylight combined with the right brightness and spread of light

Positioning the lamp exactly where the light is needed

We create contemporary lamps that look and work perfectly in your home or
professional environment

###  Twist 2 Go

Reduce eyestrain while carrying out hobbies and everyday tasks with the Twist
2 Go. Portable, rechargeable and compact, illuminate your space wherever you
are with this sturdy lamp.

###  Foldi Go

Brilliantly bright, this rechargeable lamp folds around your needs. Portable,
height adjustable and designed with a rotating head, the Foldi Go Rechargeable
Lamp enables you to get the highest quality of light positioned exactly where
you want it.

###  Tricolor

Designed with bold and visible switches, the aesthetically pleasing Tricolor
lamp is easy to operate and easy on the eyes. With a choice of colour
temperatures and adjustable brightness, find the best settings to suit your
sight.

View All

###  Electra

Change colour temperature at the touch of a button with the satin black
Electra. Slim and unobtrusive, simply position the Electra behind your table,
sofa or armchair so you can work or hobby with clarity and in comfort.

###  Slimline 3 Floor

A perfect blend of beauty and practicality. Its slim aluminium shade casts a
smooth, even light, leaving no room for shadows. With the convenient four-step
dimmer, you can easily adjust the brightness to your liking. The sleek design
and flexible joints allow you to position it effortlessly for the ideal
lighting. Say goodbye to tired eyes as the Slimline Floor Lamp enhances your
workspace with its simple yet elegant appeal and exceptional performance.

View All

###  Twist 2 Go

Reduce eyestrain while carrying out hobbies and everyday tasks with the Twist
2 Go. Portable, rechargeable and compact, illuminate your space wherever you
are with this sturdy lamp.

###  Gemini

Flexible, stable and portable, Gemini neatly folds and packs into its carry-
bag and weighs in a tiny 2.4 kg

###  Halo Go

This truly portable lamp with magnifier comes with a USB rechargeable battery.
The brightness remains consistent for the full 8 hours. The LEDs circle the
magnification lens for a uniform lighting over your project. Offering 5
dioptres (2.25X) magnification with a 12 dioptres (4.0X) inset lens for
working on the finest details. Folds flat.

View All

###  Magnificent Pro

Floor lamp, table lamp or task lamp: the choice is yours. Keep your hobbies
alive late into the evenings with this versatile, elegant and unobtrusive
magnifying lamp that will fit in with any décor.

###  iQ Magnifier

The iQ magnifier is part of the Daylight Company's range of magnifying lamps.
This lightweight magnifying lamp features a large acrylic lens, providing a
wide field of view for various tasks. With its flexible magnifying head that
holds any position, you can maximize your movements for optimal comfort and
convenience.

View All

Showing 1 of 1 results

###  iQ ESD Daylight & UV Magnifier

The iQ ESD™ is a 100% ESD-safe illuminated magnifier, independently certified
for use in EPA (Electrostatic Protected Areas) to IEC 61340-5-1 & ANSI/ESD
20:20.

Showing 2 of 2 results

###  TwoSun

If you’re experiencing winter blues or symptoms of SAD, this 2-in-1 light
therapy and task lamp is the perfect pick-me-up.

###  TriSun

If you’re experiencing winter blues or symptoms of SAD, this 2-in-1 light
therapy & desk lamp with 3 colour temperature options is the perfect pick-me-
up.

View All

###  Slimline Magnifying Arm

Magnifying arm for the Slimline range of lamps

###  Slimline Table Base

Table base designed for the Daylight Slimline table lamp.

###  Professional Table Base – White

Heavy duty table base designed to support the weight of Daylight lamps and
magnifiers. In white colour to match Daylight lamps and magnifiers 25110,
25120, 25130, 35500, 25100, N1200, N1300.

Showing 3 of 3 results

##  About Daylight

The Daylight Company is the leading market innovator in specialty lighting in
the art, needlework, craft, low vision, health & beauty and industrial sectors
in Europe, the USA and Australia. Established in London in 1987, the business
developed following the recognition that artists and needleworkers needed
quality lighting in their working environments.
